akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 94–283, title I, § 105, May 11, 1976, 90 Stat. 481

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 437a. Repealed. Pub. L. 94–283, title I, § 105, May 11, 1976, 90 Stat. 481
Section, Pub. L. 92–225, title III, § 308, as added Pub. L. 93–443, title II, § 208(a), Oct. 15, 1974, 88 Stat. 1279, required the filing of reports with the Commission by certain named persons other than individuals who act to influence others to vote for or against political candidates. See section 30120 et seq. of Title 52, Voting and Elections.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Savings ProvisionRepeal by Pub. L. 94–283 not to release or extinguish any penalty, forfeiture, or liability incurred under this section, with this section or penalty to be treated as remaining in force for the purpose of sustaining any proper action or prosecution for the enforcement of any penalty, forfeiture, or liability, see section 114 of Pub. L. 94–283, set out as a note under section 441 of this title.
